title: Gyouten Ningen Batsealer (Captain Fatz and the Seamorphs)
synopsis: With the ability to transcend time, Captain Fatz and comrades embarked on a journey of battle and adventure to gather the eight scattered stone pieces (namely Light, Darkness, Fire, Water, Air, Earth, Wood & Metal) which was granulated by the lord of destruction, in order to restore the chaotic world back to peace.
staff: [['Iwanami, Yoshikazu', ['Sound Director']], ['Nanba, Hitoshi', ['Storyboard']], ['Yamamoto, Yuu', ['Series Composition']], ['Itou, Masahiro', ['Director of Photography']]]
